title: Linking Personal Email to Local Group Email
description: We have decided to migrate to a great new email service, Migadu. What this means for you is that we will be setting up new email accounts with mailboxes for you and your group. You can either access your emails through this account, or you can configure your personal email accounts to receive and send emails using your EA Group email address. We are on hand to give you help with whatever approach you prefer.
